TopicTitle: Flixpress - Make your intros look pro.

Articles.Content:
Hello there, and here i introduce you to a new site,

www.flixpress.com

This is a great site, that can be used for companys or youtube channels!

Flixpress offers templates that range between $0-$5. General awsome intros, even for free ones.

Egzamples:

Be sure to check it out!
I do not get why people put ,minute long intros on their videos. Especially when the video itself is 30 seconds.
I do agree, it is a big long, but its cool. Also, what video are you talking about./intro.
Well if the video is from one of those good channels I'll deal with it but other than that I skip the intro...
